Client - Class in model
The type Client - entity in the database: has id, name, email, phone number and address.

ClientBLL - Class in bll
The type Client bll - business logic for client - validates the client to be added/updated into the database or for delete ensures that it exists.
ClientBLL() - Constructor for class bll.ClientBLL
Instantiates a new Client bll.
ClientController - Class in presentation.controller
The type Client controller - opens the frame for managing clients and initializes listeners for the buttons - validates the input from GUI to be non-empty, creates a new Client and passes it to the ClientBLL for validation before making operations in the database.
ClientController() - Constructor for class presentation.controller.ClientController
Instantiates a new Client controller.

connection - package connection
 
ConnectionFactory - Class in connection
The type Connection factory - this class contains the name of the driver (initialized through reflection), the database location (DBURL), and the user and the password for accessing the MySQL Server.
